data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Jose van Rankin of Santos Laguna gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 1, Ball goes out of play for a Puebla goal kick.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna in the half of Puebla.
Free kick for Santos Laguna in their own half.
In the minute 3, Throw-in Puebla.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards Santos Laguna a goal kick.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna in their own half.
In the minute 4, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a Puebla throw-in in Santos Laguna's half.
Santos Laguna needs to be cautious. Puebla have an attacking throw-in.
Puebla have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
In the minute 5, Ball safe as Santos Laguna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Santos Laguna awarded a free kick in their own half.
Santos Laguna to take a throw-in in Puebla territory.
In the minute 6, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards the home team a throw-in.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Puebla in their own half.
Corner awarded to Santos Laguna.
In the minute 12, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Santos Laguna at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
In the minute 13, Puebla awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Puebla get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos Laguna's half?
Santos Laguna's Octavio Rivero gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 16, Puebla have a goal kick.
Can Puebla capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Santos Laguna's half?
In Puebla, Osvaldo Martinez of Puebla is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 19, Ball safe as Santos Laguna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Santos Laguna to take a throw-in in Puebla territory.
Osvaldo Martinez (Puebla) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 21, Corner awarded to Puebla.
Throw-in Santos Laguna.
Throw-in for Puebla in their own half.
In the minute 23, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Puebla just outside Santos Laguna's area.
Puebla are pushing forward but Osvaldo Martinez's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Puebla.
In the minute 25, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards the home team a throw-in.
Santos Laguna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Santos Laguna awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 27, Santos Laguna have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Puebla at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
Puebla will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Santos Laguna.
In the minute 31, Santos Laguna have been given a penalty at Estadio Cuauhtemoc...
Goal! Santos Laguna take a 0-1 lead thanks to a Julio Furch spot-kick..
Santos Laguna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 34, Throw-in Puebla.
Puebla's Amaury Escoto misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Santos Laguna at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
In the minute 36, George Corral (Puebla) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards Santos Laguna a goal kick.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Puebla.
In the minute 39, Puebla have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
Jose van Rankin (Santos Laguna) has received a yellow card from Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
Puebla have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
In the minute 40, Puebla's Daniel Arreola has run offside.
Free kick for Puebla in their own half.
Throw-in for Puebla close to the penalty box.
In the minute 43, Goal! Santos Laguna extend their lead to 0-2 through David Andrade.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Puebla push forward at Estadio Cuauhtemoc and Salvador Reyes gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Santos Laguna defence.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Puebla.
Puebla's Christian Tabo gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Cuauhtemoc. But the effort is unsuccessful.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Ball safe as Santos Laguna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna in the half of Puebla.
In the minute 46, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a Santos Laguna throw-in in Puebla's half.
Free kick Santos Laguna.
Can Puebla get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos Laguna's half?
In the minute 48, Throw-in high up the field for Puebla in Puebla.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a throw-in for Puebla, close to Santos Laguna's area.
Ball goes out of play for a Santos Laguna goal kick.
In the minute 49, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Puebla in their own half.
Santos Laguna are coming forward and Julio Furch gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Puebla.
In the minute 52, Goal kick for Santos Laguna at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
Fernando Gorriaran for Santos Laguna drives towards goal at Estadio Cuauhtemoc. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Puebla at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
In the minute 53, Ball goes out of play for a Puebla goal kick.
Santos Laguna have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna in their own half.
Puebla awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 57, The home team have replaced Salvador Reyes with Santiago Ormeno. This is the first substitution made today by Juan Reynoso.
Puebla make their second substitution with Pablo Gonzalez Diaz replacing George Corral.
In the minute 58, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards the home team a throw-in.
Puebla's Amaury Escoto is whistled for offside at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
Nestor Vicente Vidrio is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 62, Can Puebla get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos Laguna's half?
Puebla's Nestor Vicente Vidrio is back in action after a slight knock.
Important block from the Puebla defence as Octavio Rivero fires in a strike for Santos Laguna.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Santos Laguna in their own half.
Throw-in Puebla.
Free kick for Santos Laguna in the half of Puebla.
In the minute 68, Christian Tabo (Puebla) gets a yellow card.
Puebla have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
Puebla's Omar Fernandez misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 70, Santos Laguna drive upfield and Octavio Rivero gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Puebla defender.
Corner awarded to Santos Laguna.
Throw-in for Puebla at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
In the minute 71, It's a goal kick for the away team in Puebla.
In Puebla a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Puebla Santos Laguna attack through Walter Sandoval. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 73, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards Puebla a goal kick.
Puebla awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Santos Laguna are pushing forward but David Andrade's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 74, It's a goal kick for the home team in Puebla.
The away team replace Bryan Garnica with Carlos Orrantia.
Daniel Alvarez is on a sub for Omar Fernandez for Puebla.
In the minute 75, Juan Reynoso is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Cuauhtemoc with Bernardo Cuesta replacing Amaury Escoto.
Free kick for Santos Laguna in their own half.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Puebla in their own half.
In the minute 78, Santiago Ormeno (Puebla) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Adrian Lozano is replacing Walter Sandoval for the away team.
Puebla have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
In the minute 79, Corner awarded to Puebla.
Puebla push upfield and Nestor Vicente Vidrio gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Santos Laguna defence.
Bernardo Cuesta is booked for the home team.
In the minute 80, Puebla have a goal kick.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards the away team a throw-in.
Puebla awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 82, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a Puebla throw-in in Santos Laguna's half.
Throw-in for Puebla in the half of Santos Laguna.
Free kick for Puebla in the half of Santos Laguna.
In the minute 84, Maximiliano Araujo is replacing Christian Tabo for Puebla at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
Daniel Alvarez of Puebla gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Santos Laguna goal kick.
In the minute 85, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Santos Laguna.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards Puebla a goal kick.
Ball safe as Santos Laguna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 87, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Puebla to take a throw-in in Santos Laguna territory.
Free kick for Santos Laguna in their own half.
In the minute 88, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Puebla in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Daniel Arreola of Puebla smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Puebla.
Puebla have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
Puebla have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick Puebla.
Puebla's Nestor Vicente Vidrio breaks free at Estadio Cuauhtemoc. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Santos Laguna at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
The match is over. Final score 0-2.
Jorge Guillermo Almada (Santos Laguna) is making a third substitution, with Eduardo Aguirre replacing Octavio Rivero.
Santos Laguna's Octavio Rivero has been booked in Puebla.
